lead_paragraph: NBC had its best night of the Rio de Janeiro Olympics on Tuesday, registering 33.4 million viewers for a broadcast that included live coverage of Michael Phelps winning his 20th and 21st gold medals, more gold for swimmer Katie Ledecky and the dominating performance of the U.S. women's gymnastics team.

headline.main: NBC Has Best Ratings Night for Rio De Janeiro Olympics
headline.print_headline: NBC Has Best Ratings Night for Rio De Janeiro Olympics
